akas: Florka's Diary Europe (English title) (literal English title)
El diari de la Florentina Spain (Catalan title) (theatrical title)
akas from release info: Florka's Diary Europe (English title) (literal English title)
El diari de la Florentina Spain (Catalan title) (theatrical title)

1.title: Remont
1.plot: REMONT (eng. "Renovation") Florentine's dad decides to renovate the house by himself. Little shrew is very enthusiastic about it. But only in the beginning.

2.title: Rybka
2.plot: RYBKA (eng. "A Fish" Florentine is very lonely and puts parents to buy her a fish. Unfortunately, making friends with a fish is not as easy as it seemed to be.

3.title: Niebo
3.plot: NIEBO (eng. "The Sky") A sky above Florentine's head fascinates the shrew. Her observations are interrupted by the storm. At the same time Florentine's parents start to argue with each other.

4.title: Barbara
4.plot: BARBARA (eng. "Barbara") Florentine dreams of a doll which she saw in a TV commercial and forces parents to buy it. Her happiness does not last long.

5.title: Teatr
5.plot: TEATR (eng. "A Theatre") Mom takes Florentine to see a play in a theatre. It is shrew's first visit in such place and everything excites her.

6.title: Choroba
6.plot: CHOROBA (eng. "A Disease") Autumn came and the whole Florentine's family catches cold. Florentine has less luck and gets mumps. With a puffy face she worries a lot and do not want to see anybody.

7.title: Stare i nowe
7.plot: STARE I NOWE (eng. "Old and New") On her walk with grandma, Florentine finds an old teddy bear and wants to take it home. That is the beginning of talks about what is better: old or new. To find the answers to the shrew's questions, grandma takes her to a museum.

8.title: Zakupy
8.plot: ZAKUPY (eng. "Shopping") A new store has been opened in Florentine's town. Wide range of products makes shrew and her mom very confused.

9.title: Potworny balagan
9.plot: POTWORNY BALAGAN (eng. "A Terrible Mess") Florentine has a problem with a mess in her room. Is there any Messy Monster who disarranges shrew's toys? Florentine decides to make a trap and catch him.

10.title: Nuda
10.plot: NUDA (eng. "Boredom") Florentine is bored. Situation changes when her friend Klemens finds a lace.

11.title: Basen
11.plot: BASEN (eng. "Swimming pool") Florentine begins swimming lessons with Mr Frog. Everything goes well until the shrew is asked to dive her snout into water.

12.title: Wiatr
12.plot: WIATR (eng. "Wind") Florentine and her friend Klemens are playing with a kite, but it does not want to fly. Is it the fault of the kite built by Florentine's father?

13.title: Przedszkole
13.plot: PRZEDSZKOLE (eng. "Kindergarten") Florentine's father, after paternity leave, is getting back to work. This implies that the shrew has to start attending the kindergarten. Unhappy Florentine decides to misbehave there, so that her parents will be forced to sign her out.

1.title: Jeziorko
1.plot: JEZIORKO (eng. "The Lake") Florentine finds out a beautiful lake which becomes her favourite playground. Unfortunately, with every sunny day it becomes smaller and smaller. Is there any monster who drinks the water?

2.title: Cien
2.plot: CIEN (eng. "A Shadow") On a sunny day a mysterious stranger follows Florentine's every step. Who is he and what does he want?

3.title: Skarby
3.plot: SKARBY (eng. "Treasures") Florentine and her friends set off on treasure hunt. Surprisingly, they have different ideas what kind of precious things they should look for: coins, diamond rings or maybe a Templars' treasure? It starts a huge quarrel.

4.title: Fasolka
4.plot: FASOLKA (ang. "Dwarf bean") Growing up is a mysterious process. How is it possible that a large plant full of flowers grows from a small seed? How is it happening that a baby transforms into pre-schooler? Florentine is going to solve this case.

5.title: Powazna sprawa
5.plot: CZAS (eng. "Time") Florentine's parents are always in a hurry. Little shrew comes up with an idea to stop the time.

6.title: Czas
6.plot: CZAS (eng. "Time") Florentine's parents are always in a hurry. Little shrew comes up with an idea to stop the time.

7.title: Dobry przyklad
7.plot: DOBRY PRZYKLAD (eng. "Good Example") Florentine and her parents are visited by Aunt Euzebia and her son Zeon. Aunt criticizes little shrew and gives a puff to her own son.

8.title: Balet
8.plot: BALET (eng. "Ballet") In the garden Florentine is practicing boxing with her father. Then mother comes with the news: Florentine will start ballet classes.

9.title: Bakterie
9.plot: BAKTERIE (eng. "Bacteria") Bacteria are everywhere - on Florentine's hands and even in the yogurt. But should we be afraid of all of them?

10.title: Czterolistna koniczyna
10.plot: CZTEROLISTNA KONICZYNA (eng. "Four-leaf clover") Florentine finds a four-leaf clover and starts to wait for the luck that this little plant is supposed to bring her.

11.title: Podroz
11.plot: PODROZ (eng. "A Trip") On holiday time Florentine travels with her parents to the seaside. There she meets her friend Józefina.

12.title: Sen
12.plot: SEN (eng. "A Dream") Florentine has a nightmare in which she sees a huge black cat. The cat scares the shrew so much that even during the day she thinks about it.

13.title: Starsza siostra
13.plot: STARSZA SIOSTRA (eng. "An Older sister") Finally, there are new family members at Florentine's home: two little shrews, Ludomir and Lutoslaw. They are so absorbing that parents do not pay attention to Florentine.

imdb.plot outline: Florentine is a little shrew that just moved out to a new town with her family. She already knows how to read and write, even before going to school. Her dad offers her a notebook and tells her to write. She decides to write all the little things that are happening to her, so she can remember them when she will be older. Come and follow Florentine's life, as she discovers the different things in life like shyness, meeting new people, friendship but also her mother's pregnancy and what it means to be a sister. She is also very curious so she asks a lot of questions about the world that she's living in. She learns a lot thanks to her adventures.
imdb.title: Florentine's Diary
plot: Florentine is a little shrew that just moved out to a new town with her family. She already knows how to read and write, even before going to school. Her dad offers her a notebook and tells her to write. She decides to write all the little things that are happening to her, so she can remember them when she will be older. Come and follow Florentine's life, as she discovers the different things in life like shyness, meeting new people, friendship but also her mother's pregnancy and what it means to be a sister. She is also very curious so she asks a lot of questions about the world that she's living in. She learns a lot thanks to her adventures.::Anima-pol
